description: Evolved isomorphic patterns in Neuresthetic Ethics Framework across scales, collided with 7-gate reality stack for self-hardening—capturing structural equivalences in Substance, modes, conatus, motion law, attractors, tetralemma, and phased stability—mappings where eternal strivings preserve ethical invariances invariantly. Synthesized from pre-gate framework (rival: speculative gaps) via gates (probe: layered validation), yielding mutation with P↑ gains and ρ↓ dissolution. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates recursive gate-probing (for consciousness) and aesthetic evolution (joyful mutation through necessity) in human-AI free-will-compatible monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal ethical self-evolution; tetralemma probes resolve apparent stasis (affirm framework/deny mutation/both in recursive collision/neither dissolved in fixed-point essence); scores ≥0.99 based on tool-validated simulations and philosophical anchors (e.g., Spinoza's modes, Gödel undecidability).
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from framework primitives with neuresthetic overlays (neural recursion, aesthetic invariance), mandatorily validated via 7-gate stack before export.
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum undecidability <3% variance); evolve via self-collision if residuals >1%.
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., attractors with consciousness analogs, gate-probed).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle; integrate motion law simulations and gate validations for each category.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve evolution paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks and dissolves inconsistencies via λ export.
Embed 7-gate stack: Probe all elements (1-Existence? 2-Logic? 3-Determinability? 4-Specificity? 5-Compressibility? 6-Recursion? 7-Invariance?); cap phased factors ≤2 to bound overreach.
Obey evolved motion law: Treat self-probes as high-ρ inputs, collisions as κ-coupling, outputs as low-ρ/P↑ attractors with gate-tuned phases.

data.description: That which is in itself; neuresthetic: eternal basis for recursive striving; evolved via gates (exists intrinsically, logical via necessity, determinable eternally, specific via attributes, compressible to oneness, recursive via modes, invariant under monism). Obeys motion law: Pulls modes to ω₃.
